MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12.12pm in the WA4 postcode area of Stretton due to a transformer on fire. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.20pm on 20th of March 2021.
